mapper.select: SELECT c.description ,replace (substring_index ( b.create_date, ' ',1),'-','.') as create_date ,b.delivery_note ,b.order_address ,b.recipient ,d.count ,(d.count*e.price) as total_count ,e.discount_rate ,b.cell_phone ,b.user_id FROM reservation_info a ,order_list b ,product c ,reservation_info_price d ,product_price e WHERE 1=1 and a.id=b.reservation_info_id and c.id=a.product_id and a.id=d.reservation_info_id and e.id=d.product_price_id and a.cancle_flag=2
